modName: Amon Amarth Followers - Guardians of Sovngarde
summary: Adds 5 new basic companions of Amon Amarth to the world of skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to see Amon amarth in Skyrim? well here you go!
Find Johan Hegg, Olavi Mikkonen, Ted Lundstrom, Fredrik Andersson and Johan Soderberg all hanging out at the back of Jorrvaskr.
 This is only a simple companion mod but I might add more features to it on a later date.
Please comment any bugs and I will try to fix them!

You will need UFO Ultimate follower overhaul for this to work completely!
mods/14037

Comments and endorsements are much appreciated! \\m/
author: Oscar455
